file_content.text: Please excuse me; I'm overseeing several operations simultaneously.
With your help, Kuat Drive Yards will be ours.
Welcome to Kuat Drive Yards: the beating heart of the Republic Navy; a heart we're about to pierce.
For centuries, Kuati ship production has afforded our enemy entire fleets, from the smallest fighters to Valor-class cruisers. We're about to turn that production in our favor.
This is my own initiative from top to bottom, executed under the aegis of Darth Marr.
The key to victory lies in a single space station. It's the defensive nerve center for the entire enterprise.
The planet's economy revolves around Kuat Drive Yards. If we take that station, they'll have no choice but to work for us.
This facility's never been taken before.
Before Admiral Ranken, no one was ever bold enough to try.
When we succeed, the Republic will crumble. The galaxy will finally fall in line with the Empire.
This is the Empire's moment.
I'd like to know who I'm supposed to be addressing here. You, or the admiral?
Which of you is in charge?
You make it sound so easy. Too easy.
You're oversimplifying.
I serve at Admiral Ranken's pleasure. She's an unparalleled strategist, and I trust her with my life.
And, as I see it, any mission insight provided by Lord Krovos is the same as if spoken by me.
Wouldn't mind it if my wealthiest employer became all the wealthier.
A win for all of us.
I believe we're at an accord. Lord Krovos?
Oh, don't mistake me--I know how ambitious my plan is, and how difficult the road ahead will be. Lord Krovos?
As we speak, a formidable Republic presence hinders our offensive at the station. We ask you to tilt the balance in our favor.
I've also deployed starfighters to key points that will aid in the Republic's downfall, should you feel the need to avail yourself as a pilot.
The Empire's day is close at hand. When that day arrives, it will be due to what we accomplish here and now.
Be strong, be merciless, and may the Force be with you.
A number of our conscripts have been taken prisoner. I'd normally write them off as worthless, but we're in bit of a staffing pinch. Free them.
I grow tired of having my bridge shot at by that station. Secure those cannons!
Our engineers want to get their hands on Kuat fighter assembly data. See what you can do about that.
The Republic must really fear our chances: they intend to sabotage the station's power core. Keep it safe, would you?
We've identified a major weapons cache the Republic could use to their advantage. Do us a favor and destroy it.
If we lose this hangar, we lose our way into the station. Defend it with your life.
Jedi: insufferable, aren't they? We have one mucking things up for us in there. Make sure this day is his last.
A single Republic trooper's been making short work of our forces. You know what to do.
The Republic can't fight their own battles, so they've sicced one of the corporate defense droids on us. Set it to scrap.
The Republic think they're so superior; you're showing them otherwise.
Excellent work. Kuat Drive Yards will be ours.
That's a win for us--one we sorely needed.
There's nothing that can stop you, is there? Good thing you're on our side.
Lord Krovos and I commend you.
Our position here grows ever stronger, thanks to you.
